meaningMnemonic: <radical>Now</radical> your <radical>mouth</radical> can <kanji>include</kanji> more words than ever before! With our new and improved “Mouth Now!” program, your mouth will include more words than you ever thought possible!
readingMnemonic: If you buy now, we’ll also <kanji>include</kanji> a handful of books by <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (がん) himself. Gandhi didn’t use our program, but we’re sure if he’d had the opportunity to, he would have used it. So buy now, and get the words of Gandhi in your hands as well as your mouth!
